You can install the development version of quartopost from GitHub with

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("petzi53/quartopost")
```

How to run
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(quartopost)

if (interactive()) {
  quartopost()
}
```
